post_title: Big HOF combos for trade (looking for Hindu, Cycle 460 and tougher)
post_content:
Hey guys.  Have these cards for trade.  I'd love to find a Brown Hindu or tougher backed HOFer.  I also have a ton of other t206s for trade.  If you have anything and would be willing to talk trade, please reach out.  I think I am real easy to work with, and talking trade is fun, even if nothing comes of it.  I bet I've made around 300 trades with net54 members.

I also have three Speaker Cycle 350s that I could trade as I long as I keep one (SGC 2, PSA 3, PSA 4).
